mapper.insert: insert into QnA (QName, contents, userName, updateDate) values (#{title},#{contents},#{userName}, #{updateDate})
mapper.select: select QID, QName as title, contents, userName, updateDate from QnA
select q.QID, q.QName as title, q.userName, q.contents, q.updateDate, a.userName as adminName, a.A_content, a.updateDate as AupdateDate from QnA q join QAnswer a on q.QID = a.QID where QID = #{qID}

select q.QName as title, q.userName, q.contents, q.updateDate, a.userName as adminName , a.A_content, a.updateDate as AupdateDate from QnA q join QAnswer a on q.QID = a.QID where q.userName = #{userName};
mapper.update: update QnA q join QAnswer a on q.QID = a.QID set q.Answer = a.aid where q.QID = #{QID};
